name: Sinking Islands
description:
First try on a Game Jam! 

***Best played with downloadable zip, but quicker with html...***

Summary

Little arcade game where you need to destroy ennemy boats and save the islands from sinking!

Controls

A: Move Left - D: Move Right - A+D : Shield-Up or Drop!

Tools

Engine: UE4

Assets : All made in Blender and Photoshop

Sound: From public libraries

Music: Self-Made
